testcase.classname: As a user, I want to view the addresses in my profile via the API connection.
testcase.name: When a GET request body containing valid authorization information is sent to the
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "customer" token............passed * The api user sets "api/profile/address-list" path parameters..............passed * The api user saves the response returned from the api profile address list endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 200.........................passed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "success".passed
